title: Get 50% Off on Amazon: All-New Echo (4th Gen) with Premium Sound, Smart Hub! | Tech Times
text: Amazon's Echo series has carved a niche as a household staple in the crowded world of smart home devices. Now, the All-New Echo (4th Gen) stands out, with Amazon offering a tempting [50% off deal](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07XKF5RM3?tag=techtimesaf-20), presenting a golden opportunity for tech buffs and smart home enthusiasts alike. The Echo (4th Gen) Deal At an irresistible [$49.99](https://www.amazon.com/dp/B07XKF5RM3?tag=techtimesaf-20) (originally priced at $99.99), this Echo iteration promises an enhanced auditory experience, streamlined smart home control, and the power of Alexa-all in a sleek, orb-like design that blends seamlessly into any living space. Premium Sound & Adaptive Intelligence The Echo's standout feature is its premium sound, adapting dynamically to any room's acoustic nuances. Equipped with a 3.0" neodymium woofer and two 0.8" tweeters, this device ensures rich, detailed audio for music streaming and smart assistant responses. Read Also: [Save $30 on Apple AirPods (2nd Gen)! Grab Yours for Just $99.99 at Best Buy](https://www.techtimes.com/articles/300138/20231228/save-on-apple-airpods-2nd-gen-grab-yours-for-just-99-at-best-buy.htm) Smart Home Hub This Echo iteration, which serves as a central control hub, enables voice control of compatible lights, locks, sensors, and other devices. Setting up Zigbee and Matter devices is simple, and they integrate seamlessly into your smart home ecosystem. The Echo (4th Gen) becomes more than just a speaker with Alexa at the helm. Set timers, create motion-triggered routines, make announcements across rooms, or even dial friends-all without using your hands. Connectivity & Expansion This Echo extends beyond music playback. It facilitates multi-room music streaming and pairs seamlessly with Fire TV for an immersive home theater experience. Furthermore, integrated Amazon Sidewalk extends device connectivity beyond your home's boundaries, ensuring devices like water sprinklers or pet locators work flawlessly at extended ranges. Design & Dimensions Sporting a compact yet powerful build-measuring 5.7" x 5.7" x 5.2" and weighing 34.2 oz-the Echo (4th Gen) fits effortlessly into various spaces, blending functionality with aesthetics. Connectivity & Warranty Dual-band wifi support, Bluetooth capabilities, and integration with eero routers ensure seamless connectivity. Backed by a 1-year limited warranty (with optional extended warranties), the device promises longevity and reliability. Reviews & User Feedback [PCMAG](https://www.pcmag.com/reviews/amazon-echo-4th-generation) lauds its sound quality and smart home hub capabilities, citing the Echo's resemblance to the Echo Plus. [SoundGuys ](https://www.soundguys.com/amazon-echo-4th-gen-review-42618/)praises its performance within the Alexa ecosystem, emphasizing its compatibility with most smart home devices. Meanwhile, [The Verge](https://www.theverge.com/21527664/amazon-echo-2020-alexa-fourth-gen-review) appreciates its room-filling sound but points out slight music processing nuances. Is the Deal Worth It? At half its list price, the Echo (4th Gen) packs a punch, combining premium sound, smart home integration, and Alexa's prowess. With its comprehensive suite of features, enhanced connectivity, and a price tag that Is hard to resist, this deal is a steal. Stay posted here at Tech Times.
